invocations.description: Returns the special area width and height.
invocations.ex:
local areaSize = getareasize('SpecialArea1')

if areaSize.w < 10 and areaSize.h < 10 then
	setareasize('SpecialArea1', 50, 50)
end
invocations.exDescription: It'll change the 'SpecialArea1' square size from 10x10 to 50x50.
